verbs.description: President Trump [V: ca] n’t expect to “ charm ” Kim Jong Un into giving up his nuclear weapons .
[ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-MOD: ca] [ARGM-NEG: n’t] [V: expect] [ARG1: to “ charm ” Kim Jong Un into giving up his nuclear weapons] .
[ARG0: President Trump] ca n’t expect to “ [V: charm] ” [ARG1: Kim Jong Un] [ARG2: into giving up his nuclear weapons] .
President Trump ca n’t expect to “ charm ” [ARG0: Kim Jong Un] into [V: giving] up [ARG1: his nuclear weapons] .
